hero.title: Welcome to Sunshine Kindergarten
hero.subtitle: Where little minds grow and flourish!

about.title: About Sunshine Kindergarten
about.description: Sunshine Kindergarten is a place where children can grow, learn, and thrive in a safe and supportive environment. We believe that every child has unique potential that can be nurtured through proper education and loving attention.
about.philosophyDescription: At Sunshine Kindergarten, we implement the Montessori method which focuses on child independence, learning through experience, and respect for each child's natural development. We believe that a well-structured environment with freedom within limits can help children develop self-discipline and a love for learning.

features.title: Child-Friendly Environment
features.description: Our classrooms are specially designed to meet children's needs, with child-sized furniture and diverse activity areas.

features.title: Play-Based Curriculum
features.description: We believe children learn best through play. Our curriculum integrates learning with fun and engaging activities.

features.title: Experienced Teachers
features.description: Our teaching team consists of experienced professionals dedicated to supporting each child's development.

features.title: Focus on Social Skills
features.description: We emphasize the importance of social and emotional skills, helping children learn empathy, cooperation, and conflict resolution.

toddler.name: Toddler Class
toddler.description: Our Toddler Class is designed to introduce children to the school environment in a gentle and fun way. Our main focus is on developing motor skills, language, and early socialization.

primary.name: Primary Class
primary.description: Our Primary Class implements the core Montessori curriculum, allowing children to explore and learn according to their own interests and pace. We focus on developing independence, concentration, and basic academic skills.

kindergarten.name: Kindergarten
kindergarten.description: Our Kindergarten program prepares children for the transition to elementary school. We deepen understanding of academic concepts while continuing to develop important social and emotional skills.
activities: Development of social skills and teamwork

games.title: Learning Through Play
games.description: At Sunshine Kindergarten, we believe that play is the best way for children to learn. Through games, children develop essential skills while having fun.

sensorial.name: Sensorial Games
sensorial.description: Sensorial games help children develop and refine their senses. These activities are crucial for cognitive development and understanding the world around them.

practical.name: Practical Life Games
practical.description: Practical life games help children learn essential everyday skills. These activities enhance children's independence and self-confidence.

language.name: Language Games
language.description: Language games help children develop their communication skills. These activities cover various aspects of language development, from listening to speaking and reading preparation.

math.name: Math Games
math.description: Math games introduce basic mathematical concepts to children in a fun and concrete way. These activities build a strong foundation for future mathematical understanding.

teachers.title: Our Teachers
teachers.description: Our teaching team consists of dedicated professionals experienced in early childhood education. They are committed to providing a positive and supportive learning environment for every child.

sarah.bio: Ms. Sarah is our lead teacher with over 10 years of experience in Montessori education. She has a passion for helping children develop a love for learning.

john.bio: Mr. John is an energetic and creative assistant teacher. With a background in arts, he brings creativity into the classroom and inspires children to express themselves.

emily.bio: Ms. Emily is our Montessori specialist. With special certification in the Montessori method, she ensures that Montessori principles are correctly applied throughout our curriculum.

teachers.joinDescription: We're always looking for passionate educators to join our team. If you have a passion for early childhood education and want to make a difference, we'd love to hear from you!
